WorkflowInfo.Name: File management automation
WorkflowInfo.Description: File management procedure - get file from FTP server, unzip and copy
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:StartFTPSession;Assembly=StartFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:FTPGetFile;Assembly=FTPGetFile, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:TerminateFTPSession;Assembly=TerminateFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ZipDecompress;Assembly=ZipDecompress, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:FileCopy;Assembly=FileCopy, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:StartFTPSession Password="41794749666942747A5653563533632F466B522F71513D3D" HostName="FTP-SRV" DisplayName="Start FTP Session" IsValid="True" HostId="44" Port="21" TypeName="StartFTPSession" Description="Starts FTP Session." TimeInSeconds="0" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" x:Name="startFTPSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" Passive="1" UserName="admin" SecureConnection="0" StartSession="FTP" /> <ns1:FTPGetFile TargetPath="c:\Archive" SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpGetFile1" HostName="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:10:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="FTP Get File" SourcePath="/log.zip" Description="FTP get a file." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPGetFile" TransferMode="0" /> <ns2:TerminateFTPSession SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="terminateFTPSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate FTP Session" Description="Terminate FTP session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateFTPSession" /> <ns3:ZipDecompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="Localhost" HostName="localhost" DisplayName="Zip Decompression" IsValid="True" HostId="1" x:Name="zipDecompress1" TypeName="ZipDecompress" CompressionLevel="{x:Null}" DstPath="C:\Transfer" SrcHostName="Localhost" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="c:\Archive\log.zip" ArchivePassword="" Description="Decompress a specified Zip file to the specified destination." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" SrcUserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns4:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns5:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\Transfer\log.txt" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="1" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"> <ns4:ReturnValue Value="Report Summary" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Contains("&&&","Report Summary")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:FileCopy DstHostName="Localhost" DstPassword="" x:Name="fileCopy1" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcUserName="" SrcHostName="Localhost" DstPath="d:\Downloads\log.txt" SrcPath="c:\Transfer\log.txt" Description="Copy a file from a source location to a destination location" DisplayName="Copy File" SrcPassword="" DstUserName="" TypeName="FileCopy" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"> <ns4:ReturnValue Value="Report Summary" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="Not Contains" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Not Contains("&&&","Report Summary")" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Data file is corruped" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail2" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.17720"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">Data file is corruped</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns4:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="ZIP file is corrupted" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.17720"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">ZIP file is corrupted</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>1</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
